website_summaries.verdict: An electric nail drill that delivers professional results from the comfort of your home for those days when you just can't make it to the salon.
pros: Makes quick work of filing, shaping, and buffing artificial nails
Includes a variety of quality attachments for each step
Reliable outlet-powered operation won't quit during a session
Comes with an extra long cord for user convenience
cons: Some complaints that this machine doesn't actually work on acrylic nails

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled with this purchase!😉
customer_reviews.text: I've spent so much time using giant nail files to smooth my gel nails... but no more! I studied quite a few of these electric nail drills and finally decided on this one. It is perfect! It's simple, easy to use, and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought which makes for easy maneuvering for tiny hands, has good weight to it. Cord is as long as an average wing span of my arms..so not very long but good for table seating. If you have the drill on the lowest setting and apply to much pressure the drill stops, but if you turn it higher it’ll keep spinning. Also the two drill bits highlighted I thought they had more teeth on them but they seem to be smooth like the smaller diamond bit ones. But they still get the job done. DONT be intimidated by it on low, touched my skin multiple times no cuts. To good of a buy saved so much time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Love this nail drill
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this since I have been getting into doing my own nails using the poly gel system and I love it. The drill is super quiet and does not heat up like other drills I have used it also comes with all the bits you would need and then some including extra sanding bits that you would need to file and smooth your nails.the drill is small and compact so it is easy to travel with and store away. I will ordering from this company again soon.
customer_reviews.author: BuffyKitten

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners e-file
customer_reviews.text: I'm learning how to do nails and I absolutely love this e-file. It make it so easy to use and hold in my hand. Makes filing my own nail and acrylic great!
customer_reviews.author: LovlyBob2be

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst drill a beginner could possibly buy. It lasted about 2 weeks and died on me. I requested a refund and bought a much better drill. This one vibrates very bad and i would advice getting a professional more expensive drill. I ended up spending about 48 dollars on my new jewhitney drill (they also offer one for 35 dollars its just as good but it doesnt have a digital display)and i am MORE THAN SATISFIED. If you plan on using your drill on yourself and other people i definitely would not recomend this drill!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase this.. Unit broke with two uses
customer_reviews.text: Take your money and invest in a better product. I do my nails every two-three weeks and this still has already stopped working after only two uses. The first time I used it I noticed that it got extremely hot in my hand and had to turn it off multiple times to cool down. Hadn’t used it in a few weeks.. today, same thing happened. Would get hot before finishing one nail. Now it won’t turn back on after almost an hour. Such a disappointment. Not sure if I just got a faulty unit or if they are all junk. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Snider

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you plan to do polygel/acrylics on your own
customer_reviews.text: Love this drill!! I’m a student and recently started trying to do my own poly gel nails to save some money. Since I’m a beginner, the nail shapes that I originally form are initially really rough and lopsided, but that’s where this drill comes in. It’s stable; doesn’t wobble at all and has a surprising amount of power given how small it is. I also appreciate that there are buffing refills and different types of heads which help me get the coffin shape I love so much. I’ve attached a quick vid to show my finished nails after I shaped them!!
customer_reviews.author: aikimi

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward and affordable. I finally decided to take the plunge after watching DIY nail videos. The vibrations are low, so it’s easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Liu

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Update: lever to control forward/backward broke. Maybe not the best in the market lol..... Really worth its value, received my drill in great condition and it works perfectly! It also comes with a forward/backward switch and speed control! I received 50 additional sand bits which was great, only 5 of them were defective. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrinita🌻

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I stand by my previous review of the drill breaking after a couple cases, but I was mistaken about the customer service. They made sure I got a new drill and that I was satisfied. I think some of the drills have a malfunction or something, but the new one I got is working just fine! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I’ve bought in this quarantine. I had a full dip set bought for me for my birthday and I loved it but was missing a key thing to keep doing my nails at home. THIS this is all you need to save money and do your nails at home... okay maybe patience is a big part too haha. But this electric drill has everything I need and I love all the different tool heads! So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, words great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and comes with all different replacement sander heads. The cord could be longer but great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sano

customer_reviews.title: So far it's a pretty decent drill for the price
customer_reviews.text: This nail deal has turned out better than I expected for the price. It help take off my old set of nails and smooth my new set. I would recommend buying more bits, the ones that come with it are great but I'f u plan on taking off any gel,or acrylic with it u need different bits. Otherwise for the price I'm pretty pleased. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work upon arrival!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the product. It was a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She opened on Christmas morning plugged it in and it would not come on. Thought maybe it was the plug so I had to plug it into a different outlet, it still did not turn on. Call them to get a replacement couldn't because it was sold by a third party and then was told I had to wait up to 2 weeks to get a refund and I don't even want a refund I just want the item and I wanted to work. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Most Important Part -  The Actual Drill
customer_reviews.text: Received this electric drill today. Was so excited to remove my gel polish. Read the directions, plugged it in. No drill. I had even purchased extra bits. Not going to do me any good without a drill. I'll be more than happy to change my rating if the seller sends me a drill to go along with the rest of my order.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done i guess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a first time drill when I began doing my own acrylics.. It works & gets the job done, but it does vibrate alot. Makes it harder to hold it to do one set nvm multiple clients & it doesn't feel comfortable when you use it on your nails. It vibrates alot! I never knew it was as bad as it is until I recieved my melodysusie nail drill (bought off amazon too) & it was so quiet & BARELY even vibrates at all! So again, its alright if you dont have 60 bucks for the melody susie (scarlet) nail drill i bought, but if you got the extra money for sure just go with the melodysusie..
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Leite

customer_reviews.title: super simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I just did my friends nails during quarantine 2020. i haven't painted nails in 20 year, muchelss taken them off. I took mine off with some junky battery operated drill. bought this and taking nails off was a breeze!~ i just didn't likehow small the controls were on the item, BUT it wouldn't stop me from buying another one or telling everyone to buy it. Great item ESP during these times when we aren't wasting money and we need something that actually works!! great item!
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the DIY nail types
customer_reviews.text: I got this to remove my fake nails. I also got a load of acetone which I didn't end up using. This was far more effective and painless. Lots of different heads. My favorite part is the speed function. Also came with instructions, yay!!!! I have used this on my natural nails (pedicures) and it was PERFECT!!! What a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cullen

customer_reviews.title: I tried to love this drill...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a decent drill but didn’t want to spend a ton of money. I LOVED how small this drill was. So comfortable to hold and not too intimidating. I am very much a beginner. Right away, I struggled getting the bits out of the barrel. They were STUCK! Kept having to use pliers to remove them. Still lived with it until yesterday the bits were intensely wobbling!! It was actually hurting my fingers it was so intense. Going to invest in a different one, one that properly holds the bits like a regular drill. If you have super man strength, go ahead and order.
customer_reviews.author: Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Stops working.
customer_reviews.text: At first the drill worked great, then in the middle of removing my acrylics, the drill had stopped working. We read the handbook and we thought maybe some dust had gotten in but that wasn’t the problem. Then we had let it rest just in case we use it too much (even though i just bought it) and that still did not work. I guess the drill had just been over worked and could not be used again.
customer_reviews.author: mtran

customer_reviews.title: Was nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a little over a month ago. I've used it a handful of times and it wont turn on anymore. It started turning off on it's own while using it and now it wont turn on. Tried unplugging it and plugging it back in. Tried turning it off and then back on
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff for nails
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill for nails. It’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiia Shibalova

customer_reviews.title: Great nail drill!
customer_reviews.text: My packaged arrived on time and nicely packaged. The box the nail drill comes in holds everything perfectly and is good for storing the drill. The drill has speed settings and the ability to spin in either direction. This comes with 11 bits and the manual shows a picture of each one and what it is used for. It has a problem solving chart that's very helpful. There are numerous YouTube tutorials you can watch to learn techniques and usage. This drill works great! I had 4 friends come over and we all did SNS nails together and shared the drill so it has good power.
customer_reviews.author: Lady A

customer_reviews.title: It was great... until
customer_reviews.text: The product works... when it works. Unfortunately, the device did not even turn on when I tried to use it for a third time. Last time I used it must have been six months ago. I don't know what happened to it, it just doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re thinking about it.. just buy it! It took me so long to order this because I didn’t think I needed it. Last night I finally did my poly gel nails and having this made it so much easier! Especially when I had to fix the amount of poly gel I put on my nail (I put too much LMAOO !!). Overall, easy to use. I never used a nail drill before this if I can use it anyone can :)
customer_reviews.author: SHOPPING-MAMA

customer_reviews.title: Gets HOT!
customer_reviews.text: EDITED: company returned my money after posting my review. Customer service is top notch. This gets extremely hot and uncomfortAble very quickly. There is a breakdown of some of the tips (when to use) but not all. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Its a good started drill
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter drill, however the bits that are included are not great at all. if you are going to buy, make sure you also order more bits. the drill itself , it does not vibrate that bad at all. Only issue for me was the drill bits, they give you a lot but they are not the best quality at all ; ** update ** The company reached out and made it right. So I can only update my rating to reflect. I really appreciate them reaching out and making everything good. Will do business with them again based on the experience that I had .
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Lee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: the reason why i got this drill was because of the price. some of the reviews claimed that the drill stopped working after a few weeks and that's exactly what mine did. mine literally stopped working after 2-3 weeks of light, regular use. i only used it to do my nails, not for work etc... when it burned out it literally smelled like rotten eggs and was getting really hot. the little red light on the cord was barely flashing. after that i tried to turn it on but it wouldn't budge. DO NOT BUY THIS DRILL YOU WILL END UP LOSING YOUR MONEY. Invest in another drill, just not this one!
customer_reviews.author: jen malone

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine file
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to file down my acrylics because I can’t get to the salon for my fill-in because of self quarantining. It’s the perfect affordable choice.
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for doing my own acrylics (I'm a relative beginner btw). The drill is really easy to use and they include instructions/descriptions for each bit and its use. It gets the job done! I only wish it was a little bit stronger, it takes a while to really file down acrylics and get rid of bumps. The cord is really long too, so it is super nice and easy to find a convenient plug in close to your area. For the price, I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica C.

customer_reviews.title: Very weak drill, highest setting can’t shave down acrylic/polygel/nexgen
customer_reviews.text: This thing is weak, even on the highest setting it can barely get through polygel or dip powder, I don’t like it at all and the cord is short and so awkward. I didn’t realize when I ordered it you have to keep it plugged in and also all the buttons are on the cord instead of the drill, it’s not a good design at all. I don’t even understand the purpose of this, it’s def not strong enough for acrylic nails.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Herod

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to all the nail salons being shut down due to Covid-19. Have been having my nails professionally done for 20+ years. Bought this to grind down the acrylic on my nails and shorten them. Fits in your hand very nicely, and is lightweight. Takes a few minutes to get the hang of turning the speed up or down and which tip to use on your nails. But overall I am very happy with the ease of use, the amount of tips provided, the price point and how nice your nails turn out. I had zero problem changing tips, not sure why people struggled with that unless they pushed them in way too far. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Received this less than two months ago and during my third use the drill shut off. It has not worked properly since this incident. I reached out to the company, and initially they responded quickly and I thought they would help me with this situation. Now they have ignored my emails and I’m left with a broken drill. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Makes DIY nail sesh so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use. I'm a beginner and feel this would also work for those who are distinguished DIY nail people. I get so many compliments and people were shocked when I told them I did them, way easier than using an Emory block! Etoile recommends and would buy again. Also the length of the cord is perfect, I can sit at the kitchen table and plug into wall behind my chair and there's about a foot of extra cord when I set it on the table. It's great, way better than the battery operated one from the big box store! Must have! Great price great product! Thank you for reading!
customer_reviews.author: A. RUSS

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after second use.
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for my wife, she loved it and said it was great. Then she informed me that during her second use it just stopped working. It sucks because the return window closed. Buyer beware you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jean

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for at-home use
customer_reviews.text: I do not like going to the salon and sitting for an hour or more to get my nails done. I do my own Manis at home, but didiss that perfectly polished look. I enjoy this kit because it comes with a variety of drill tips and it is electric. You can choose to have it spin clockwise or counterclockwise and has a dial for speed. This is a great little investment for your own nails, but it's not a heavy duty for a professional to use in a shop. It's got enough weight to.be comfortable and easy to control, but not heavy enough to make your arm hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Nice little nail set
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a nail drill for some time but didn't want to pay a lot of money for something that I probably wouldn't use more than once or twice a month. This nail drill fits the bill. It does come with an instruction leaflet but I wish it would go into a little more detail about using each attachment. But really it isn't hard to figure out and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: luckicj

customer_reviews.title: Not unless it’s your only option
customer_reviews.text: This will get the job done if you’re someone just trying to get through to the next nail appointment. If you’re really into doing your nails and plan on doing nail enhancements like acrylic and doing them yourself from here on out: this will not be your drill. I can see using this drill if I wanted to focus on my feet and do clean up. Or even to buff polish off my gel/acrylic tips and do my own fills every now and again. But it’s truly just my backup drill for myself. Not for use on others
customer_reviews.author: StinaBaby21

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but NO FREE CLIPPERS
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my teenager as a Christmas gift who wants to learn how to do acrylic nails. I tried it out to see how it worked. Super cute & easy to use. UPDATE: I still have not received the free pair nail clippers that is offered with the drill. I do not even see a way to contact the store directly. I could not add it in my cart along with the clippers as the instructions state. I was advised to do a review & it would automatically be sent to me. Still nothing. Someone please advise.
customer_reviews.author: tsamarij

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY! GOOD FOR ONE USE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one use! Used on n off for 30 mins and it died before I could even finish my nails. Don't waste your money. It got extremely hot after 5 mins and I was using it only on low. Smh.
customer_reviews.author: Zyzydaboss

customer_reviews.title: Great little drill
customer_reviews.text: **edit I decided that after learning to use the drill the speed is good. I was just a little fumbly with it at first. This drill is great for removing my nails, which I use dipping powder on and then soak/drill off just like they do at the salon. This nail drill is a game changer for anyone trying to learn how to do their own nails at home. The only thing is I wish that the speed went just a little lower, of course that may change as I get more comfortable using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie campbell

customer_reviews.title: Get one! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a seasoned Cosmetologist of 23 years. This is amazing. My overpriced professional one didn’t hold a candle to this little guy. The price is insanely affordable. Bought this expecting for it to be disposable but, no way. I would highly recommend for beginners or advanced. If you aren’t familiar with a nail drill start slow. You can damage your matrix, bed and cuticle. Enjoy it! Be careful! Oh and all the components it comes with, holy cow. I was floored.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie G

customer_reviews.title: Beginner
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and well balanced. There is a forward and a reverse setting, as well as a speed setting. I bought this during Covid and I think it works well for me as a beginner. It comes with a package of sandbit replacers and other metal bits. The speed setting is located about 10 inches from the e-file on the wire. It does weigh it down a little. I usually drape it over something so it doesn’t feel like it is weighing the e-file down. I like using it. I’ve used it on myself and on my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t able to use it at all.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product and had good expectations due to its reviews. I understood there were steps to follow prior to use for voltage/set up. (I read the manual prior to trying it). But the product did not work. Not even a slow speed. The plugs light indicated it was taking electricity. The product itself was faulty. Very disappointed. Recommend spending a few extra dollars on a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: michelle s.

customer_reviews.title: My review on the Efile Nail Drill Kit
customer_reviews.text: This drill is more managable than my bigger one, but you cannot turn the speed down any lower. When doing your own and your customers nails its very important that you can control the speed of your drill. I love being able to switch the drill forward and in reverse. But I am only going to use it to remove my nail polish because the speed is too fast.
customer_reviews.author: MsVal

customer_reviews.title: Close to professional quality
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t like to do my own nails but thanks to the quarantine life I wasn’t left much choice. This is a great little tool. Easy to use, powerful and compact. Would have been nice if it came with a carry bag. I used an old compact makeup bag so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Quelinda

customer_reviews.title: Best portable nail drill and accessories kit for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This portable nail drill came with many drill bits, probably way more than I will ever use but I love having the different options. There were many disposable bits included, too, which I appreciated. The drill felt good in my hand and I think would be easy to use to help file and shape my nails. It was my first time using this type of drill but I think I will like it. A nice instruction manual came with the set but I do wish more information was provided about the different drill bits. All in all I am very satisfied and customer service was stellar.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: This item broke in less than 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: The drill bits in this item are horrible. They are difficult to change and get jammed up in the drill. So upset because the return window has passed. I have to use pliers in order to change the drill bits and still the machine does not work properly. I have only had this item for about 3 months. Don’t waste money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Soto-Powell

customer_reviews.title: Got a whole 1.5 uses
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect if it didn't die on the second use. I used it in 15-20 second bursts then would turn it off, because I KNEW a small, cheap motor could easily over heat. The second time I used it, about 2 weeks after my first initial use, the motor burned out. I did like the ease of use and the attachments it provided, which is why it doesn't get a 1 star review. I knew I was taking a gamble with a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little Efile! Packs a punch! There’s some e files that stop when you put more pressure on the nail but this one doesn’t. The drill bits it comes with are pretty weak. Took me a while to file down no dip so it can look smooth. Ended up using my own file to speed up the process. Def recommend buying your own drill bits if you you’re working with gel fill ins or no dip. Regular no chip gel polish you should be fine w the drill bits it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: saldana06

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners drill & affordable
customer_reviews.text: I like the affordability and functionality of this but there are a few things that I’m not a big fan of. Most drills are made so you twist to release the bits and then twist to tighten, this one you just shove it in, which makes them kind of difficult to get in and then back out. There are a few other things here and there but overall for the price it’s a good beginners drill and it’s super affordable. I don’t mind the little things too much because I only do my nails and maybe a friends here and there. I’m not using it on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great value and perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to purchase one of these for quite some time and after reading a ton of reviews, this seemed like the best choice for someone whose never used one. I’ve been giving myself manis and pedis for years and this nail drill was fun and easy to use. I tried all the bits that came with it and they all functioned the way they were supposed to. Great value and perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.author: ScarlettMinx

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Small, so it’s easier to move around the nails with it. Cord is decent length, which is always important. Good product for decent price. I’m happy with my purchase & would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: StarlaHaskin

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! I love that you can control the speed and it has so many different tips so you can use it for classic manicures or gels or dipping! It’s very quiet and light so it handles great for at-home manicures and pedicures. If you’re a noob like me the slow speed really helps with getting used to it, and it a great tool for following nail-care nail art tutorials on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Edcy Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Works well until it won't turn on!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several other brands and this one isn't bad! Strong enough to get the job done, until it shuts off. I used it for about 2 minutes, then turned it off. Never would turn back on. Didn't switch between reverse and forward. Didn't overheat it. It just won't turn on again. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Scott

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: This drill worked fine the few times I was able to use before it malfunctioned. One major flaw is that there is no way to tell if drill bit is in properly, so it’s very easy to get the bit stuck in the drill. It gets very hot when it’s plugged In (even when not in use) which worried me, so I’ll take it as a sign that it just stopped working. Would be a decent price point if i got more than a few months use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have tool for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This drill worked really great compared to another one I’ve purchased on Amazon. You can control the speed and direction of the drill, which I found extremely helpful in not hurting myself, and it includes so many drill bits, it really upgraded my nail game. As a beginner to dipping my own nails, this really helps me get less lumpy and more uniform nails that last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ruff on your nails. Even the low speed is really fast and kind of burns your nail. Not great but I can use it for a second here and there to even out nails.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost - Professional Results
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is incredible. Plug power means great speed on both low and high settings. Lightweight, cord is long, and differing attachments file replacement heads are plentiful. I’ve used this for a couple of weeks for at home dip nails and it makes the application process so much easier. This is a super low cost product that offers professional results.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Must have for dip nails
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just used dip powder for the first time and ordered this to thin it out so it doesn’t look so thick and chunky on my nails- this thing works so well!! My diy acrylic and dip look freakin amazing after shaping with this thing. I didn’t realize how helpful it would be to have the drill be able to switch directions too.
customer_reviews.author: keepfrozen

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good, but now it has stopped working and I’m past the return window. Very very disappointed for sure. Update. I sent off an email to the company that supplied this product to see if they would warranty it, since it was less than 2 months old. Unfortunately I have not heard a word from them. Sad to say I’m stuck with a product that lasted less than 2 months. Think twice before buying. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L  Foster

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Professional-Looking Nails!
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing my own dip nails for almost a year. I had gotten pretty good at it and while none of my mistakes were too noticeable, I would've been so annoyed if I had gone to a salon and they came out that way. I finally bought the nail drill and WOW! They look perfect and professional. So thin, smooth and even. I love this tool and my only complaint is that I waited way too long to buy one. The number attachments that come with it is impressive. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Meridith O.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used one personally but my manicurist did once. OMG this is a great little tool. Comes with lots of extras. The on/off and speed control are tiny and located on the cord. I wish this was chargeable and had controls on the wand but I don’t know how others are designed. Functionally it does the job and more!
customer_reviews.author: M. Krug

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for at home use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a nail drill before but this was very easy to use. It’s slim and has many different drill heads. I found it helpful to watch a YouTube video because I didn’t know which drill heads to use for different steps of applying acrylic nails. Overall, this was an excellent buy for someone wanting a drill for at home use!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and straightforward to operate. No messing around to change the bits. Just push in firmly or pull it out. Super quiet. But the motor is strong! I got 2 different sets of bits and a bag of 50 disposable sand paper things in the box! Which I didn't expect so that was pretty cool. But because I didn't know, I purchased some bits as they were offering a discount. So I guess technically that was the only thing that I would change. Because I ended spending a few extra bucks. But truthfully it's totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: CIA Remote Operative

customer_reviews.title: Good dog nail trimmer too
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to take off a horrible manicure I got so didn’t really use it much at first Then I discovered I can use this for my dogs nails and he definitely prefers it over clipping So far so good
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: After many hours of watching YouTube videos, I wanted to get some inexpensive things to start filling my own acrylics when I couldn't go to the salon to get them done. This e-file is okay if you have steady hands and tons of patience. The starting died is very fast and not too powerful, so I find myself either accidentally nicking my cuticles or getting small friction burns. After using it a couple times, however, I am learning ways around that issue. If you have the money, spring for a more expensive one, if you don't, you can make this one work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Gwatney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, with one poorly designed feature...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a great kit with a nice variety of heads. I use it on my dog's nails and on my own occasionally. The biggest design issue is that the directional control and the power switch aren't on the grinder itself. They are on the power cable. Not the biggest deal except that it means you need two hands to adjust the speed or change the direction of the grinder. So, if you're doing something delicate or if both your hands aren't available. The drill can be a little tricky. Overall, a nice product. I would definitely recommend it. That's just one poorly designed feature.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Only five bits
customer_reviews.text: I received 5 drill bits instead of six and since I'm new to this I'm not certain what bits to use and the instructions don't provide much so I won't say it's beginner friendly. I got a bag full of sanding bands in the package but none of the bits provided fit. If you must purchase this due to it's affordable price, you may need to purchase another set of bits separately. I can't say much for the functionality since I don't have the bits I need. I'll update this review when I receive my new bits
customer_reviews.author: Reanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use smooth out my toenails that had cracked due to an infection and it worked great. I started at the slowest speed until I became comfortable with it and didn't have any problems. It is light and easy to hold. There are 12 different size attachments and additional sand paper bands. Recently I have used it to remove gel powder nail polish and it worked really well. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RoZ1318

customer_reviews.title: Great manicure tool!
customer_reviews.text: I have dip nail polish from a salon. Regular remover will take it off but it's tedious. This set helped remove top layer of polish so remover could do its job better then helped remove those last little stubborn bits of polish.! Ithis got me through quarantine with decent nails until my salon was able to re-open
customer_reviews.author: Gwencie

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Edited*** I had to come back and edit my review as the company reached out to me and replaced all the drill bits. That was really great to know they actually care about the product they are selling. ***** Loved the drill easy to use for a beginner. The wool tip got stuck and I had to use pliers to get it out. Can't use that attachment anymore. That was the only negative I have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: shireco

customer_reviews.title: affordable quality!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! i got it because I wanted to start doing gel nails at home rather than paying 50 bucks at the salon! It is easy to use and comes with all the tips you could need while doing an in home manicure/pedicure. I can't wait to update my own nails every couple of weeks and thanks to this drill set removing gel is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Joy McElveen

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: This drill is a game changer if you do or want to learn how to do your own nails! I’ve been getting dip powder manicures for years and invested in the the supplies but it really didn’t turn out very good so I went back to getting my nails done. Since the pandemic started obviously making it to the nail salon has been more difficult. Plus the money I saved by doing it myself. Be patient. It takes a few tries to do it just like the nail professionals but watch a couple YouTube videos and emulate what You’ve seen them do and you can do it. I’m very happy I bought this drill.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gandre

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is good wish it had a little holder or stand. It does get hot on your nail though but I think the more often I use it the easier it will become definitely start at lowest setting and work your way up. I have smaller hands so it's not the easiest for me to hold, still a very good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dunnuck

customer_reviews.title: Great for detail work besides nails!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this for my nails per se, but rather for sanding on a micro scale (figurines, jewelry mending, touch ups on baked clay models, etc) and it works perfectly. I can get into every edge and corner and with the adjustable speed and ability to switch directions, it is one of the best products I’ve had. My only complaint is that they need to include replacement tips for the metal ends, and maybe making the fit between the base and the filing tips tighter. Otherwise, fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to File to smooth and buff my nails to prep for gel polish and aid in the removal of old gel polish. When you go to a nail salon they have a more professional version of this nail file but this one works perfectly. It’s so easy for me to do my nails at home now and have them look professional. Who needs the salon when I have all the tools at home. This product did exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H March

customer_reviews.title: Dublin
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and during the period of Covid 19 was a life saver as far as taking care of my nails when I couldn't go to the nail shop. It's not as strong as the professional one but it works to extend the time until you can go back to the shop again. I lot easier and quicker than hand filing.
customer_reviews.author: DrJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and experienced.
customer_reviews.text: I was accustomed to going to the nail salon every couple weeks. During the Covid situation, I had to figure out how to do my own gel nail fill at home. All the salons have been closed for two months. My nails were falling apart. I didn’t want to spend much money in case I sucked at figuring this out. This device has been extremely easy to use, easy to handle, and has performed very well. I like that it has the option to reverse rotation. This is very helpful when switching from right to left hand use. It also comes with some attachments to use. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Hope A.

customer_reviews.title: Great E-file Drill!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for an electric nail drill since I’ve started doing powder dip at home and I came upon this one. It had great reviews and came with plenty of drills, bits, and sanding bands so I decided to give it a shot. I’m so glad I did because it’s amazing!!! It made my nails really clean and neat and it’s lightweight which is an added bonus! Overall highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious of the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a defective one because mine would burn scorching hot after 30 seconds of use. The handle would be so hot that I would have to set it down. It definitely didn't feel very safe. This seemed cheaply made. Going to return and look for a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners. I just started doing my own nails during quarantine and I’m in love with this drill. I absolutely despise hand filing, and this was such a bargain! Has all the bits you need, plus great speed control. I’ve been recommending it to everyone in my nail groups lol.
customer_reviews.author: votreseulpoison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product super amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about this product I b this one because I had one I bought at Walmart and was a battery device run out of batteries fast I thought 14 dollars 🤔 well I can try is not to expensive the one I bought at Walmart was about 12 dollar similar price but the function of this product is amazing I am super happy with this product recommen this 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great valuw
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually pretty impressed with all the tips this came with. It takes some leading to get the right pressure and which tips work best but the price is really good for this. I just got it so I don’t know how long the tips will last or how to get replacements but there are a lot of tips included
customer_reviews.author: MGervo

customer_reviews.title: Just order it, dont think to much!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine to use for beginners. You can go forward/reverse/slow/fast. The cord is a good length and your able to hold it with one hand and its not heavy. Ive enjoyed using it. It removed my gel nails and i also do dip and it files down easily. If you push down to hard it will stop but you dont even need to push down the filer really does the job. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months :(
customer_reviews.text: I do my own nails at home every so often to save money. I do not use this professionally. That being said, I have used this maybe twice a month so about 8 times? And it has officially stopped working :/ guess you get what you pay for. I will be contacting the seller and will update after.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Denise

customer_reviews.title: Electric...not battery operated
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this Dremel tool. Its well accessorized and does a super good job cleaning my acrylics up. I needed something to take on a 3 month trip and had my fingers crossed this would fit the ticket. A great product at an affordable price
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Buy this NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor a buy this kit! It is so easy to use and does a great job! I’ve been doing my own nails lately and could never get my cuticles right! This did the trick! The tools did a great job at preparing my nails for polish and they look great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for shortening real nails that nail techs are too lazy to trim after you get a fill at the salon. I fix up my nails a little bit when I get home, and this is so easy to use for beginners. Just hold it steady and make sure you put it on the right direction because it accidentally spun to the top side of my acrylic nail and scuffed the smooth surface. Also helpful in filing the top of my toe nail, taking off the first layer of nail dyed by my nail polish so I have natural looking toe nails again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I recently began doing my own dip powder at home and wanted a drill to try rather than buffing. This drill was low cost and GREAT value. I would recommend this drill to anyone. You easily control the speed and the manual explains what each piece is used for. I spend a little longer on my nails now because I am getting used to the drill but it is worth every minute and penny I spent on this!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: Self Care Self Love
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars because it does what I want it to do which was file my cuticles down and smooth my nails. I dont typically do my nails but I am at a time in my life where I can focus on self care. This set is a must have. My fingers and toes have NEVER looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Nail Drill
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is very nice and directions are clear. Took some time to read over the directions, which are pretty self explanatory, and then started. It was so easy and made my nails look great! They now last so much longer because of this! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set- I am a beginner but learning quickly, this set is an amazing value for anyone! (Also, added bonus- the 3/32 bit size can accommodate most other beds for other uses around the house! I just ordered a felt bit to polish my jewelry with- exactly what my jeweler uses)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drill I was kind of skeptical ordering it but I’m never manually filing my nails again after I butchered my cuticles lol so I figured what the hell. It’s super cute and quiet and worked great on my dip nails I did. I’m a super beginner and I was able to use this with no issues. I’m glad it came with a booklet so I could tell which bits were for what. Over all extremely happy with my new drill & would recommend for anyone .
customer_reviews.author: Bri m

customer_reviews.title: VERY powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to remove gel nail polish. BUT, BE CAREFUL!! I didn't realize there was a dial to slow and speed the spinning, and I buzzed down a few nails to nothing because I had it on full blast! Once I figured out to use it on the slowest speed, it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Owens

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: Beginners! This is the tool for you. Just started doing nails and this product gets the job done, it does tend to heat up fast during use of clients so I’m going to have to invest in another one maybe one that’s more durable and of professional quality for the future. But this one works well too, especially for personal use and for beginners for sure
customer_reviews.author: Alajah Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The drill is very easy to use. It was my first time touching any nail drill. Everything you need is in there. It's easy to hold. My only negative is that I wish the instructions were a little more detailed for the drill bits. I'm confident I will figure it out online though.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: easy and portable
customer_reviews.text: I use this more than my larger drill with the foot pedal. It's easy and I love carrying it out to do someone's hands. After a long time holding it your hand can cramp a little but the ease of use you just can't beat. Makes me feel more precise in my work
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne (AJ)

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this happens to anyone else but I thought I received a faulty drill but the company diligently reached out to me and offered to kindly replace the drill. The style of the handle is comfortable and it comes with a good selection of bits. This is by far some of the best customer service I have experienced with an amazon company.
customer_reviews.author: Shandeline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nail fle
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much when I bought this because it's so low priced but it works amazing. It comes with a bunch of different tips for different parts of the nail. I can use it on my fingernails and toenails because it has really good power.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy J

product_meta.title: AIRSEE Portable Electric Nail Drill Professional Efile Nail Drill Kit For Acrylic, Gel Nails, Manicure Pedicure Polishing Shape Tools with 11Pcs Nail Drill Bits and 56 Sanding Bands
feature_bullets: Professional Nail Drill Set: Elegant Packaging with AIRSEE logo and comes with 11pcs different 3/32” shank drill bits and 56Pcs sanding bands, multi-functional for easily grinding, carving, cutting, polishing, removing gel polish and cuticles for both acrylic nails and natural nails.

Adjustable Speed and Direction: Speed control button to adjust the speed 0-20,000 RPM. and the design with Forward and Reverse rotation directions are suitable for any right-handed or left-handed use. It makes this electric nail file easier to smooth your nails.
Portable & Compact Design: This Nail drill machine made of high-quality metal, tiny and lightweight design, easy to handle and carry it anywhere.

Powerful Function: Professional high-tech speed bearing and motor, It makes the electric file low heat, low noise, and low vibration. Just need to connect the power cord with efile to start working. It is professional for both home, salon, and school use.
Professional Service: We have a 24 hours customer service. Any problem, kindly contact seller first.
